attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this petition is to save the species of Orangutans, our closest living relative. if we do not act now then these magnificent creatures will be extinct in the wild in 6yrs! we NEED to do some thing, so this is why i have made this petition. sign now before so many lives die. we HAVE to do some thing, now.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
